H0.text: What is the name of the basket used to keep bees. Hivebox

H1.text: What is the name of the basket used to keep bees. Apicase

H2.text: What is the name of the basket used to keep bees. Beebasket

H3.text: What is the name of the basket used to keep bees. Skep

A4.text: Skeps, baskets placed open-end-down, have been used to house bees for some 2000 years.

A5.text: Skeps were made from wicker plastered with mud and dung but after the Middle Ages, almost all were made of straw.
